alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bennington and northwestern Windham Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cambridge, or 7 miles south of Salem, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Londonderry, Townshend, Manchester, Stratton, Shaftsbury, Dorset, Manchester Center, West Wardsboro, Windham, Jamaica, Sunderland, Wardsboro, Rupert, Sandgate, Peru, Glastenbury, Wardsboro Center, Beartown and Goose City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Vermont.
